questions.text: A particle moves along a straight line with velocity v = 3t² - 6t + 2 m/s. Find the acceleration at t = 2 seconds.
questions.subject: physics
questions.solution:
Given: v = 3t² - 6t + 2
Acceleration a = dv/dt = 6t - 6
At t = 2s: a = 6(2) - 6 = 12 - 6 = 6 m/s²

questions.text: Calculate the pH of a 0.01 M HCl solution.
questions.subject: chemistry
questions.solution:
HCl is a strong acid, so [H⁺] = 0.01 M
pH = -log[H⁺] = -log(0.01) = -log(10⁻²) = 2

questions.text: Find the derivative of f(x) = sin(x²) with respect to x.
questions.subject: mathematics
questions.solution: Using chain rule: f'(x) = cos(x²) · d/dx(x²) = cos(x²) · 2x = 2x·cos(x²)
